descriptiveText: My idea for a wine tasting app, that lets your senses combine and guide you to taste the different grape types and distinct them from eachother,
title: Vino La Vida

descriptiveText: Another great story of a great collaboration at the Academy. Me and my teammates madethis app for Givskud Zoo, guiding the user around the park with limiteduse of electronics. I was responsible for user research, design, prototyping and the final documentation.
title: Givskud
